snippet: The move is retaliation after a Russian reporter had been stripped of his right to live in Poland amid suspicions of espionage.
abstract: Russia expels Polish journalist Waclaw Radziwinowicz in retaliatory move following ejection of Russian journalist Leonid Sviridov by Poland amid suspicions of espionage; Poland denounces move, saying it will further strain  relations between two countries.
lead_paragraph: The move is retaliation after a Russian reporter had been stripped of his right to live in Poland amid suspicions of espionage.
